entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 13 this evening then falling. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming east 20 before morning. Temperature rising to 13 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. A few showers beginning in the morning. Local amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 7 May 2023
